      Subclasses of Tile in nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.a3.maze.tiles 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BlueButton
      On activation, causes every tank to reverse direction.
      class  BlueDoorTile
      Blue door opens with a blue key
      class  BlueFreeTile
      Looks like a blue wall tile but acts as a free tile.
      class  BlueWallTile
      Acts as a wall tile but looks like a blue wall.
      class  BombTile
      Bomb kills the player, and all actors
      class  BrownButton
      Brown button opens the trap when held down.
      class  DirtTile
      Dirt tiles act as walls to monsters and blocks until stood on by the player
      class  DoorTile
      Door tiles take keys and open
      class  ExitTile
      Exits the current level, returns to main menu.
      class  FireTile
      Fire acts as a wall to bugs.
      class  ForceFloorDownTile
      Forces the player in the downwards direction
      class  ForceFloorLeftTile
      Forces the player is the leftwards direction
      class  ForceFloorRightTile
      Forces the player in the rightward direction.
      class  ForceFloorTile 
      class  ForceFloorUpTile
      Forces a player in the upward direction.
      class  FreeTile
      Class for representing a free tile in the game
      class  GravelTile
      Class for representing gravel in the game.
      class  GreenButton
      On activation, changes the state of every toggle wall.
      class  GreenDoorTile
      Opens with the green key.
      class  HiddenWallTile
      It's a wall, but looks like a free tile until chap tries to stand on it.
      class  HintTile
      Displays text on the canvas.
      class  IceTile
      Ice tiles make any moving object that step on them move in the direction they stepped on the tile at double the normal speed.
      class  InvisibleWallTile
      It's a wall, but looks like a free tile.
      class  RecessedWallTile
      Recessed Wall acts as a wall to everything but the Player.
      class  RedButton
      On activation, causes the connected clone machine to activate.
      class  RedDoorTile
      Opens with a red key.
      class  SocketTile
      Exit door for the level, only allows you through once you have collected the correct amount chips.
      class  TeleportTile
      Teleports player to another teleport.
      class  TimerWallTile
      Recessed Wall acts as a wall to everything but the Player.
      class  ToggleWallTile
      Toggles when green button is clicked.
      class  TrapTile
      Traps the player on this tile until the brown button is pressed.
      class  WallTile
      Represents a wall in the game, no actor can pass this tile.
      class  WaterTile
      Water will kill any monster, other than the glider, that steps on the tile.
      class  YellowDoorTile
      Opens with a yellow key.
